description: This file provides wrapper functions for authentication operations, encapsulating calls to an API client for login, registration, logout, and setting authentication tokens.

methods.name: export async function login(email: string, password: string): Promise<AuthResponse> { login
methods.description: Logs a user in using the configured API client.

methods.name: export async function register(email: string, password: string): Promise<AuthResponse> { register
methods.description: Registers a user using the configured API client.

methods.name: export async function logout(): Promise<void> { logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user using the configured API client.

methods.name: export function setAuthToken(token: string | null): void { setAuthToken
methods.description: Sets the token used by the API client for authenticated requests.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^export async function login(email: string, password: string): Promise<AuthResponse> {$/

ctags.name: register
ctags.pattern: /^export async function register(email: string, password: string): Promise<AuthResponse> {$/
